name: Bullet Heck (LudovicoTech)
description:
The game I made for the second Discord Game Jam.

A simple bullet hell where you upgrade your ship between waves of enemies, destroy ships to gain money which you can spend on your own ship.

Arrow keys to move, shift to dash which gives a small amount of invulnerability, and hold space to shoot.

Assets were not created by me, ships are from Katyusha Le: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/r2nem

Song is by Ben Prunty from the game FTL, you can press q if you would rather switch to a beepbox song I made.
